_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:1.11^speaker: The monk who only used discarded things
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:2.3^where_before_or_ar: The hall with the peaked roof in the Great Wood near Vesālī
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:2.3^who_mentioned_befo: the monk who has been given the full ordination
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40^where: The hall with the peaked roof in the Great Wood near Vesālī
